com.ultracast.player

Interface UC360Player


  • public interface UC360Player

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  UC360Player.EventListener
      Listener of changes in player state.
      static class  UC360Player.Factory
      The factory class for the UC360Player.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MODE_MOTION
      Only a gyroscope is used to rotate a video.
      static int MODE_MOTION_WITH_TOUCH
      Both modes MODE_MOTION and MODE_TOUCH are available at the same time.
      static int MODE_TOUCH
      Only a swiping is used to rotate a video
      static int STATE_BUFFERING
      The player is unable to immediately play from the current position.
      static int STATE_ENDED
      The player has finished playing the media.
      static int STATE_IDLE
      The player does not have a source to play, so it is neither buffering nor ready to play.
      static int STATE_READY
      The player is able to immediately play from the current position.
      static int TYPE_DEVICE_NOT_SUPPORTED
      The used device is not supported.
      static int TYPE_SOURCE
      The error occurred loading data from a source.
      static int TYPE_UNEXPECTED
      The error was unexpected.

    • Field Detail

      • STATE_IDLE

        static final int STATE_IDLE
        The player does not have a source to play, so it is neither buffering nor ready to play.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • STATE_BUFFERING

        static final int STATE_BUFFERING
        The player is unable to immediately play from the current position. The cause is renderer specific, but this state typically occurs when more data needs to be loaded to be ready to play, or more data needs to be buffered for playback to resume.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • STATE_READY

        static final int STATE_READY
        The player is able to immediately play from the current position.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • STATE_ENDED

        static final int STATE_ENDED
        The player has finished playing the media.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TYPE_SOURCE

        static final int TYPE_SOURCE
        The error occurred loading data from a source.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TYPE_DEVICE_NOT_SUPPORTED

        static final int TYPE_DEVICE_NOT_SUPPORTED
        The used device is not supported.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TYPE_UNEXPECTED

        static final int TYPE_UNEXPECTED
        The error was unexpected.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MODE_MOTION

        static final int MODE_MOTION
        Only a gyroscope is used to rotate a video.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MODE_TOUCH

        static final int MODE_TOUCH
        Only a swiping is used to rotate a video
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MODE_MOTION_WITH_TOUCH

        static final int MODE_MOTION_WITH_TOUCH
        Both modes MODE_MOTION and MODE_TOUCH are available at the same time.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • addOnPlayerEventListener

        void addOnPlayerEventListener(UC360Player.EventListener listener)
        Register a listener to receive events from the player.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to register.

      • getBufferedPercentage

        int getBufferedPercentage()
        Returns a percentage of the content that has been buffered.
        Returns:
        the percentage (0-100)

      • getBufferedPosition

        long getBufferedPosition()
        Returns a position of content that has been buffered.
        Returns:
        position, in milliseconds.

      • getCurrentTime

        long getCurrentTime()
        Returns the playback position, in milliseconds.

      • getDuration

        long getDuration()
        Returns the duration, in milliseconds.

      • getVideoFormat

        @Nullable
Format getVideoFormat()
        Returns the video format currently being played, or null if no video is being played.

      • getPlaybackState

        int getPlaybackState()
        Returns the current state of the player.
        See Also:
        STATE_IDLE, STATE_BUFFERING, STATE_READY, STATE_ENDED

      • init

        void init(@IdRes
          int glViewId,
          int mode)
        Sets the initial values.
        Parameters:
        glViewId - the view identifier. Must be GLSurfaceView or GLTextureView.
        mode - the VR mode
        See Also:
        MODE_MOTION, MODE_TOUCH, MODE_MOTION_WITH_TOUCH

      • isPlaying

        boolean isPlaying()
        Checks whether the UC360Player is playing.
        Returns:
        true if playing, false otherwise

      • onDestroy

        void onDestroy()
        This method must be called in the activity's Activity.onDestroy() method.

      • onOrientationChanged

        void onOrientationChanged()
        This method must be called in the activity's Activity.onConfigurationChanged(Configuration))} method.

      • onPause

        void onPause()
        This method must be called in the activity's Activity.onPause() method.

      • onResume

        void onResume()
        This method must be called in the activity's Activity.onResume() method.

      • onStart

        void onStart()
        This method must be called in the activity's Activity.onStart() method.

      • onStop

        void onStop()
        This method must be called in the activity's Activity.onStop() method.

      • openUrl

        void openUrl(android.net.Uri uri,
             boolean startPlayWhenReady,
             boolean isLive)
        Initialized a UC360Player for a given Uri.
        Parameters:
        uri - the Uri from which to get the source
        startPlayWhenReady - if true starts playback when the source is opened
        isLive - true if source is live stream

      • pause

        void pause()
        Pauses playback. Call play() to resume.

      • play

        void play()
        Starts or resumes playback.

      • removeOnPlayerEventListener

        void removeOnPlayerEventListener(UC360Player.EventListener listener)
        Unregister a listener. The listener will no longer receive events from the player.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to unregister.

      • resetCurrentPosition

        void resetCurrentPosition(boolean resetPosition)
        Resetting the playback position the default position. Need to be called before openUrl(Uri, boolean, boolean).
        Parameters:
        resetPosition - Whether the playback position should be reset to the default position. If false, playback will start from the position defined by getCurrentTime().

      • seek

        void seek(long timeMs)
        Seeks to specified time position.
        Parameters:
        timeMs - the position in milliseconds to seek to

      • setMaximumZoom

        void setMaximumZoom(float value)
        Sets a maximum zoom level.
        Parameters:
        value - maximum zoom level

      • setMinimumZoom

        void setMinimumZoom(float value)
        Sets a minimum zoom level.
        Parameters:
        value - minimum zoom level

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stops playback.

      • switchControlMode

        void switchControlMode(int mode)
        Sets the VR mode.
        Parameters:
        mode - the VR mode to set
        See Also:
        MODE_MOTION, MODE_TOUCH, MODE_MOTION_WITH_TOUCH

      • switchVrMode

        void switchVrMode()
        Enables or disables VR mode.
